title: Manage Cell Bank Inventory
description: A scientist needs to retrieve a vial from the master cell bank for use in an experiment and document the process.

tasks.description: Search the LIMS for the location of the master cell bank for 'Cell Line Y'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct liquid nitrogen freezer and canister location.

tasks.description: Document the retrieval of one vial from the cell bank.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the removal of the vial, decrementing the inventory count by one.

tasks.description: Document the thawing and plating of the cells for the new experiment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new record for the derived cell culture, linking it back to the parent vial.
